requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A traveling employee named Sam who needs up-to-date travel and reimbursement information.
user_goal: Sam wants to view his latest bookings and reimbursement status on the travel portal.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Sam logs in and lands on the dashboard, expecting to see his most recent travel bookings and reimbursement updates.
narrative_steps.action: Page loads and frontend makes authenticated API requests to fetch user-specific data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard populates dynamically with Sam's upcoming trips and reimbursement statuses without requiring manual refresh.

requirement_tested: A backend application that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer named Taylor responsible for deploying backend services.
user_goal: Taylor wants to ensure the backend connects properly to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Service
narrative_steps.description: Taylor deploys the backend and ensures it initializes using the correct database environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Start backend server with DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Backend successfully establishes a connection to the PostgreSQL database and logs confirmation of initialization.

requirement_tested: User authentication and authorization system for employees
user_persona: An employee named Jordan trying to access the travel portal.
user_goal: Jordan wants to securely log in to the system and access his personalized dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Jordan visits the login page and enters his email and password to gain access.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid email and password, then click the 'Login' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Jordan is redirected to his personalized dashboard with no error messages displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Handling Invalid Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Jordan mistakenly enters the wrong password and tries to log in again.
narrative_steps.action: Submit incorrect password and observe form feedback.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inline validation error appears under the password field prompting Jordan to re-enter his credentials.

requirement_tested: Ticket booking interface for flights with search, selection, and confirmation
user_persona: A frequent flyer named Riley planning a business trip.
user_goal: Riley needs to book a flight from New York to San Francisco for next week.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Flights
narrative_steps.description: Riley fills out the flight search form with origin, destination, and travel dates.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in 'New York' as origin, 'San Francisco' as destination, select dates, and click 'Search Flights'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of available flights with prices, durations, and airline logos populates below the search form.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting and Confirming Flight
narrative_steps.description: Riley reviews flight options and selects one that fits his schedule.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a flight card to expand details, then click 'Confirm Booking'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Booking confirmation page displays with flight details, seat info, and total cost.

requirement_tested: Hotel booking interface with search, filtering, and reservation capabilities
user_persona: A project manager named Casey looking for a hotel near the conference venue.
user_goal: Casey wants to find and reserve a hotel within a specific price range and location.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering Hotels
narrative_steps.description: Casey applies filters to narrow down hotel options based on price and location.
narrative_steps.action: Adjust price range slider and select proximity filter, then apply filters.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Hotel listings update instantly to show only those matching Casey's criteria.

narrative_steps.title: Reserving a Room
narrative_steps.description: Casey chooses a suitable hotel and proceeds to reserve a room.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Reserve' on a hotel card, review details in the modal, then click 'Confirm Reservation'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Reservation is created successfully, and Casey is redirected to the payment flow.

requirement_tested: Train booking interface with schedule viewing and ticket purchasing
user_persona: A commuter named Alex traveling between cities for a meeting.
user_goal: Alex needs to check train schedules and purchase a ticket for tomorrow's commute.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Train Schedules
narrative_steps.description: Alex searches for available trains between two cities on a specific date.
narrative_steps.action: Enter source and destination cities, select travel date, and click search.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Timetable of matching trains with departure times, duration, and class options is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Purchasing a Ticket
narrative_steps.description: Alex selects a convenient train and proceeds to buy a ticket.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Book Now' on a train row, fill in passenger details, select seat, and complete purchase.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Ticket confirmation screen appears with journey details and a downloadable PDF e-ticket.

requirement_tested: Settlements report generation feature for travel expenses
user_persona: A finance analyst named Morgan tasked with monthly travel expense reporting.
user_goal: Morgan wants to generate a settlement report for a specific department and date range.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Settlement Report
narrative_steps.description: Morgan accesses the report generator and sets filters for the desired report scope.
narrative_steps.action: Select department, set date range, choose export format, and click 'Generate Settlement Report'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Report is generated and made available for download in the selected format.

requirement_tested: Reimbursement application submission form with expense details and documentation upload
user_persona: An employee named Taylor returning from a business trip.
user_goal: Taylor wants to submit a reimbursement application with multiple expenses and attached receipts.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Expenses
narrative_steps.description: Taylor begins filling out the reimbursement form by adding multiple expense items.
narrative_steps.action: Click '+ Add Another Expense' to add several expense entries with details.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Multiple expense fields are appended to the form, ready for input.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading Receipts
narrative_steps.description: Taylor uploads digital copies of receipts corresponding to each expense.
narrative_steps.action: Drag and drop receipt files or browse to upload them, associating each with the correct expense.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Thumbnail previews of uploaded receipts appear next to their associated expenses.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Application
narrative_steps.description: Taylor reviews all entries and submits the reimbursement request.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Submit Reimbursement Request' after validating all required fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Application is successfully submitted, and Taylor sees a confirmation page with a reference ID.

requirement_tested: Reimbursement status tracking dashboard for users
user_persona: A manager named Quinn checking the status of submitted reimbursements.
user_goal: Quinn wants to monitor the processing status of recent reimbursement claims.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Quinn logs in and navigates to the reimbursement status dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the reimbursement dashboard after logging in.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard displays a list of recent reimbursement submissions with current status badges.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Detailed Status
narrative_steps.description: Quinn clicks on a reimbursement entry to see detailed progress information.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a reimbursement row to view detailed status page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Status page shows a timeline of processing stages, reviewer comments, and uploaded documents.

requirement_tested: Admin panel for processing reimbursements and managing bookings
user_persona: An admin named Bailey overseeing travel arrangements and reimbursements.
user_goal: Bailey wants to approve a pending reimbursement and modify an existing booking.

narrative_steps.title: Approving Reimbursement
narrative_steps.description: Bailey reviews a pending reimbursement and decides to approve it.
narrative_steps.action: Open reimbursement details and click the 'Approve' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Reimbursement status updates to 'Approved', and the requester receives a notification.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Booking
narrative_steps.description: Bailey notices a mistake in a booking and edits the details.
narrative_steps.action: Select the booking, make necessary edits to fields like traveler name or dates, and save.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Changes are saved successfully, and the updated booking reflects in the system immediately.

requirement_tested: Payment integration for handling travel transactions
user_persona: A traveler named Devon completing a hotel reservation.
user_goal: Devon wants to pay securely for his hotel booking online.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Payment Details
narrative_steps.description: Devon reaches the checkout page and fills in his payment information.
narrative_steps.action: Enter credit card details in the secure checkout form and click 'Pay Now'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Payment is processed securely, and Devon receives confirmation of his booking and payment.

requirement_tested: Expense categorization and receipt management system
user_persona: An employee named Robin organizing travel receipts after returning from a trip.
user_goal: Robin wants to tag receipts with appropriate categories and delete irrelevant ones.

narrative_steps.title: Tagging Receipts
narrative_steps.description: Robin uploads several receipts and assigns them to specific expense categories.
narrative_steps.action: Click on each receipt and assign an appropriate category from the dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each receipt is tagged with the selected category and linked to corresponding expense entries.

narrative_steps.title: Deleting Unwanted Receipts
narrative_steps.description: Robin finds a duplicate receipt and deletes it from the system.
narrative_steps.action: Select the receipt and click 'Delete', then confirm the deletion.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Receipt is removed permanently from the system with no trace left in storage or database.

requirement_tested: Travel policy validation during booking and reimbursement processes
user_persona: A budget-conscious employee named Lee making a hotel reservation.
user_goal: Lee wants to book a hotel that complies with company travel policies.

narrative_steps.title: Detecting Policy Violation
narrative_steps.description: Lee selects a hotel that exceeds the allowed budget limit.
narrative_steps.action: Choose a high-cost hotel and attempt to proceed with booking.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An alert banner appears warning Lee about the policy violation and suggesting alternatives.

narrative_steps.title: Requesting Policy Override
narrative_steps.description: Lee decides to request an exception for the higher-cost hotel.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Request Exception', provide justification, and submit for approval.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Override request is sent to the manager for review, and Lee receives a notification of submission.

requirement_tested: Reporting dashboard for finance teams to review settlements
user_persona: A finance lead named Jordan analyzing travel spending trends.
user_goal: Jordan wants to explore monthly spending data and save a customized report view.

narrative_steps.title: Drilling Into Data
narrative_steps.description: Jordan clicks on a chart segment to investigate specific spending categories.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a bar segment in the monthly spending chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Underlying data table filters to show only the related subset for further analysis.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Custom View
narrative_steps.description: Jordan applies custom filters and saves the view for future reference.
narrative_steps.action: Apply custom filters and click 'Save View'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Customized report configuration is added to Jordan's personal dashboard shortcuts.

requirement_tested: Responsive UI design with white container backgrounds and navy component visuals
user_persona: A mobile user named Taylor accessing the travel portal on a smartphone.
user_goal: Taylor wants to navigate and use the portal seamlessly on a small screen device.

narrative_steps.title: Adaptive Layout on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Taylor opens the portal on a mobile browser and begins browsing content.
narrative_steps.action: Load the portal on a mobile device and interact with the interface.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: UI elements adjust appropriatelyâ€”navigation collapses into a hamburger menu, forms stack vertically, and spacing remains readable.
